text: vony ne pobachyly skilʹky heneratsiy pered tym, yak yim my vynyshchyly? My vstanovyly yikh na zemli bilʹsh nizh my dlya vas, ta my showered yim z blahoslovennyam, velykodushno, ta my yakshcho yim z techuchymy potokamy. My todi vynyshchyly yikh vnaslidok yikhnikh hrikhiv, ta my zaminyly inshu heneratsiyu u yikhnʹomu mistsi
